author: Mariana
subject: OT: Testing
body:
I've tried to send several e-mails to the list and haven't received 'em, I
have only received 2 ML messages this week (Daniel's), If you receive this
message, could you forward it to mcorda@ciudad.com.ar, so that I know it
reached you all and I can find out what's going on?
Thanks a bunch, and sorry to bother you with this.
Mari ^_^
http://ladymariann.nav.to
